item.title: About us
item.description:
Who We Are

Poesis is a pioneering AI startup planning to transform investment strategies through advanced machine learning and data analysis.

Composed of leading experts in AI, finance, and technology, our team is currently focused on developing our MVP, poised to set new standards in the industry.

What We Do

  • Developing Our MVP: Actively crafting a state-of-the-art product to provide predictive analytics and actionable financial insights.
  • Empowering Decision-Making: Utilizing AI to simplify complex data, helping investors make more informed decisions.
  • Innovating Investment Strategies: Harnessing machine learning to uncover and exploit market opportunities.

Why Choose Us?

  • Innovative Approach: Our ongoing development of the MVP reflects our commitment to leading-edge solutions.
  • Expert Team: Guided by visionary leadership, our team brings together decades of expertise from the fields of AI and financial markets.
  • Customized Insights: We tailor our tools to meet the specific needs of our clients, enhancing their ability to make informed decisions in complex markets.

Let’s Connect!

Interested in learning more about our technology or have inquiries? We’re here to help:

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact us today and let’s explore how our innovative AI solutions can empower your investment decisions.

item.title: Prose
item.description:
@tailwindcss/typography

View on GitHub!

Beautiful typographic defaults for HTML you don’t control.

The official Tailwind CSS Typography plugin provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML you don’t control, like HTML rendered from Markdown, or pulled from a CMS.

Tailwind CSS IntelliSense extension for Visual Studio Code

<article class="prose lg:prose-xl">
  {{ markdown }}
</article>

To see what it looks like in action, check out our live demo on Tailwind Play. ​
